attributes.action: demand that the Gurns offer Windy a new 10 Contract!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since Windy has become manager of the 'famous' Green, Red and Black of East Belfast, he has enlightened the Irish League with his predictions and statements of the future. He has been a constant delight to us all, and we DEMAND that the Prime Minister decrees that he stays at his beloved club forever!

Audaces Fortuna Juvat

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
